fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.i18n.translators.properties

Class PropertiesTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.i18n.translators.Translator
      • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.i18n.translators.properties.PropertiesTranslator

  • public class PropertiesTranslator
extends Translator
    Loads translations stored in a .properties or .class file, using Java native resource bundles.

    The file are loaded from the file system instead of the JAR file, to allow end-user changes.

    • This translator does not support plurals. If plurals are used, the first string will always be used, and the other, ignored.
    • This translator does not support contexts. If a context is provided, it is simply ignored.

    Special keys

    Some keys have a special meaning:

    • meta-author: the translator;
    • meta-team: the translation team;
    • meta-reports: the person to contact if translation errors are found.

    If you need these keys in your properties files, you can add the quartzlib-i18n-no-metadata key in the file somewhere, with a non-empty value. The keys above will in this case no longer be special.

      • getContextKey

        protected String getContextKey(String context)
        The context should always be ignored. Returns the key to use in the translation map for the given context. Must be consistent: multiple calls with the same context must return the same value.

        The default implementation returns the context, or a randomly generated no-context key if the context is null.

        Overrides:
        getContextKey in class Translator
        Parameters:
        context - The context. May be null.
        Returns:
        The key to use. Cannot be null.
